Sharpclaws::

"Sharpclaws to Darkfate... We're ready..." said Sharpclaws using his 
comm link. 

"We're ready to cover you..." answered Darkfate

"Do you see that Red-golden bot?" said Sharclaws to Scorponok "He's 
Darkfate... we have to run where he is -Now if you're ready, we have 
to run"

Sharpclaws started to turn off his vehicle's mode motor, soon he 
would be running where Darkfate was watting them...




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Roger" said Scorponok, then suddenly the scorpion leapt off the 
tank and
> converted to his new race car mode following behind. "I'll take a 
chance to
> test out my new mode" he said while sticking close to the large 
tank.
